DOC.brief_summary: The objective study examine efficacy tolerability three-year-Testosterone replacement therapy hypogonadal patient well patient 's compliance . The replacement therapy perform new Testosterone Gel examine previous trial Testosteron Gel Wolff .
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study examine efficacy tolerability three-year-Testosterone replacement therapy hypogonadal patient well patient 's compliance . The replacement therapy perform new Testosterone Gel examine previous trial Testosteron Gel Wolff ( TGW ) . A minimum 100 patient recruit evenly distribute two treatment arm . 1st arm : dermal ( non-scrotal ) application TGW . 2nd arm : scrotal application TGW .
DOC.criteria: men hypergonadotropic hypogonadism hypogonadotropic hypogonadism lateonset hypogonadism combine initial Testosterone serum level < 11 nmol/l know suspected carcinoma prostate clinically relevant abnormality clinical chemistry haematology severe medical condition opinion investigator
